title: What is the growing impact of technology in teaching? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology is the mother of modern civilization! Technology is a gift from God as loads of work has made our manual tasks easier through automated services which is getting upgraded every day. Yes! Technology plays a major role in everyone’s life. While we inhale the true essence of technology, our growing children’s education has also revolutionized in many ways. The digital way of introducing prompt literacy skill for individuals around the globe has already gained immense popularity and had shrunken the old method of teaching approach in an enjoyable way of learning. In a nutshell to nurture yourself, and to fill the gap, you need to grow with the current technology trend this helps you to stand out of the crowd. This short article, will help you to understand the effect of technology in the teaching sphere in the modern era! How technology moulded our learning and teaching process in the competitive world? The waves of modern technology have shaped the students to be independent in the classroom. Markets are flooded with broad bands which are more easily accessible and usable by students. The unlimited surfing of the internet at anytime, anywhere has made them prepare in advance well before each academic session. Even, the doubts that arise during the learning process can be cleared in a fraction of seconds without any difficulty. Thanks to technology! Here are a few ways the technology moulded the teaching and learning skill inside the four corners of the classroom: It enhances students to prepare with lesson preparation in advance. Also, it helps teachers to lessen their busy working space and hence the educator can have more interactive sessions with students. More flexible assessment can be designed and this helps to access student’s mental ability, listening skills and understanding levels more deeply. Technology helps students to learn new skills beyond the classroom, share ideas, and discuss with the other students to know more about the subject. Technology affords better access to numerous resources of learning material from around the globe. Technology helps students to be more interactive and collaborative. The heights of interest in self-learning also increase manifolds. Final thoughts: The current technological growth in teaching provides students with numerous learning benefits. Utilizing technology in the right way at the right time is the need of the hour to bounce high with the flying colours. Sometimes the technology can also be a threat as the increased use can invite many health issues. Keeping a time limit and learning in the right manner shouldn’t bring any distraction. The journey of learning is a never-ending process, hence keeps growing and keep learning whenever any new technology is introduced in the market!

Shalom Every educational aids you use today for teaching are technologies. Now you do your homework and think how you learn and from there you start to define the different technologies. In friendship Rima
